root.name: El Matador
root.description: GameplayThe gameplay is very much the same as in other traditional 3rd person shooter games. The players is able to use a wide variety of firearms and is tasked with bringing down drug kingpins, uncovering a conspiracy within his agency as the game goes on. The player is able to temporarily slow down time to score more accurate shots on enemies, as seen in the popular Max Payne games before. The levels are all completely linear and contain lots of scripted events to keep the action going.
